Key Match Events: Home side Bahrain took the lead in the 14th minute through Mohamed Mahroon.
Ragnar Oratmangoen equalized for Indonesia just before the end of the first half.
Rafael Struick scored a stunning curling goal in the 75th minute to give Indonesia a 2-1 lead.
Mohamed Mahroon scored again for Bahrain in the 98th minute to level the score at 2-2.
Post-Match Reflections: The Indonesian national team lodged a strong protest, arguing that the referee's decision had put them at an unfair disadvantage.
The public, especially Indonesian netizens, reacted strongly to the incident, with the hashtag #Wasit becoming a trending topic in Indonesia on the X platform with over 212,000 tweets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Referee Ahmed Abu Bakar Said Al Kaf's decision to allow play to continue after the allotted time had expired raised questions.
The extra time granted was six minutes, but the match ended well beyond that point.
